invention-title: Large-scale production of inexpensive energy hydrogen
大规模生产廉价能源用氢

abstract.p: The invention discloses hydrogen for large-scale production of energy sources, belongs to the field of energy sources, and solves the problems that harmless application of fusion energy needs to simulate a deep sea environment, double-reactor in-water fusion, shock wave generation and high temperature are all provided with guide plates and various self-cooling heat-resistant system schemes for decomposition, and water pyrolysis is an extremely strong heat absorption process, so that an inner reactor needs to contain more than the total amount of water capable of being split by fusion generation energy; the outer reactor contains several times of the inner reactor water. A large amount of superhigh-temperature heat bodies which are instantaneously produced need to be timely sent to a corresponding pyrolysis chamber outside the reactor to be cracked and then enter a separation tower to produce hydrogen. And directly extracting gas from the temperature region of 4500-2500 DEG C of the inner reactor, and cooling to obtain hydrogen and oxygen. The inner pile facilities are all coated by graphite material inner-cooling sponge bodies, high-pressure water columns are sprayed out or a self-cooling system is used for cooling, the outer pile supplies inner pile pressure and water sources, and the difference between the inner pile facilities and the research of long-term heat group preservation in the traditional technical field is that the device aims to extinguish heat groups as soon as possible and convert nuclear energy into hydrogen energy.

大规模生产能源用氢属能源领域，解决聚变能无害应用需模似深海环境、采用双堆水中聚变、生成冲击波和高温都有导向板和多种自冷耐热系统方案化解，水热解是极強的吸热过程、故内堆需容纳大于聚变生成能可裂解水的总量，外堆容内堆水量数倍。对瞬间产出大量超高温热体须及时送堆外相应的热解室裂解后进入分离塔产氢。另从内堆4500℃～2500℃温度区域直接提取气体冷却后也得到氢氧。內堆设施全由石墨材料內冷海绵体敷面、喷出高压水柱或自冷系统降温、外堆供内堆压力和水源，和传统技术界努力长期保存热团研究不同点是本发明力图尽快熄灭热团、将核能转化为氢能。
